name: Venture to the Underworld
description:
This 2D platformer is based off of the ancient legend of the fateful love of Orpheus for Eurydice.

Orpheus, the player, ventures to the underworld with his lyre. The melodies played from the lyre cause the enemies to go to sleep leading the player on a glorious journey to rescue Eurydice.

. . .

There is no sound, pls forgive me :(
